channel.title: A question about a cool idea. Rep++ If helped
channel.description:
Ok, I want to make my new party room at:
[code] X: 3360 Y: 3335[/code]
I want to make it so I have a command that when I use it, it teles all there. Also, I want it to have the features of jail so if I tele all, they cant tele or log out unless I do a command similar to unjail which teles them all home or something along those lines. Also, how can I blackout my screen? Thanks in advance. I will also Rep++ The person who helps.

item.title: A question about a cool idea. Rep++ If helped
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Alright, thanks alot, Rep++.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2008, 07:29:39 pm[/size][hr]Also does this tele all? I canâ€™t save. What if I log out and log in? Will i be teleblocked?

Read full topic

item.title: A question about a cool idea. Rep++ If helped
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You mean the variable?
Declare it anywhere within the class outside of a method.

private boolean canLogOut; // A value of false will automatically be assigned to this variable since it is a field.

Read full topic

item.title: A question about a cool idea. Rep++ If helped
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

just one question, how do I declare the method you put?

item.source: A question about a cool idea. Rep++ If helped

item.title: A question about a cool idea. Rep++ If helped
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("party") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("X Screech X")) { for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p == null) continue; client c = (client)p; c.teleportToX = 3357 + misc.random(6); c.teleportToY = 3332 + misc.random(6); c.teleblock = true; c.canLogOut = true; // Declare this variable first. Enclose the logout method in an if statement that doesn't allow players to log out if this variable is true. c.sendMessage("You have been teleported to the party room."); } }

Read full topic
